long_description: thus, on 26 th june 2001, the pakistan mathematical society (pakms) came into being. the governing body of the society is the executive council (pakms ec). membership of the society is open to any person who holds at least a masters degree (or bs) in mathematics, irrespective of gender, race, creed, region or sect. the society is dedicated to supporting and encouraging those involved in research, teaching, and the learning of mathematics at all levels. it also organizes and supports seminars, workshops, lectures, educational meetings, etc. it also cooperates with other scientific, technological and industrial bodies in activities that intend to promote mathematics. it organizes on a regular basis quarterly national seminars, publishes a quarterly newsletter, supports an annual international conference and publishes its proceedings.
generated_description: the pakistan mathematical society (pakms) is a non-governmental mathematical organization registered with the government of pakistan, making it the largest mathematical society in the country. it was established in 2001 to address the poor state of mathematics education in pakistan and the lack of interest in its development at the governmental and private level. the society is open to anyone holding a master's degree in mathematics, regardless of gender, race, creed, region, or sect. pakms organizes seminars, workshops, lectures, and educational meetings, and cooperates with other scientific, technological, and industrial bodies to promote mathematics. the governing body of the society is the executive council, which includes five elected office bearers.
generated_business_tags: mathematics research and education | non-governmental mathematical organization | education & meetings | mathematical knowledge development | analytical and critical reports
